name: Red Roblox v2.1.8
description:
A person had made a red roblox theme, but i have since updated it.

If you see anything blue, tell me and ill turn it red ;)
additional_info:
Original Theme: https://userstyles.org/styles/108334/red-roblox-v1-1-0
Original Author: Kawasuzu

Screenshot: http://puu.sh/lK5cq/7c46dd9d29.jpg (it was too big to upload.)

Version 2.1
- Fixed a bug where group chats would look really messed up.

Version 2.1.1
- Fixed search bar looking weird.

Version 2.1.2
- Edited the "Share" button on home page to be red.

Version 2.1.3
- Fixed chat.

Version 2.1.4
- Changed color's in chat for parties

Version 2.1.5
- Fixed some stuff that was blue because of new updates!

Version 2.1.6
- Fixed more blue stuff that was added
- Fixed various graphical "glitches"

Version 2.1.7
- Fixed more stuff that was blue
- May add optional option to bring back old logo if ROBLOX doesn't do it.

Version 2.1.8 - March 3rd, 2018
- Made more stuff blue, completely forgot this existed!

Tags: roblox red updated new retheme

discussions.name: Very nice, works just fine for me. Even my Roblox Cheez-Its stayed
